summary: This is an email forwarding a previous message from an FBI Special Agent regarding additional identifiers for a subpoena to Amazon. It provides phone numbers, email addresses, and Amazon transaction details for Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson to assist in a criminal investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email provides additional identifiers (phones, email, Amazon transactions) for her as part of a subpoena request in criminal case CRIM1048721.

persons.name: Ghislaine Borgerson
persons.context: The email provides additional identifiers (phones, email, Amazon transactions) for her alongside Ghislaine Maxwell as part of a subpoena request.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
persons.context: The agent sent the original email on January 16, 2020, providing the additional identifiers for the Amazon subpoena in response to a request.

connections.description: Both are listed together as subjects for whom additional identifiers are being provided for the same Amazon subpoena in the same criminal case.

connections.person1: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
connections.description: The FBI agent is providing investigative data (identifiers, transaction details) for Ghislaine Maxwell as part of a criminal subpoena.

connections.person1: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking
connections.description: The FBI agent is providing investigative data (identifiers, transaction details) for Ghislaine Borgerson as part of a criminal subpoena.

events.title: FBI Agent provides identifiers for subpoena
events.description: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit sends an email with additional identifiers (phones, email, Amazon transactions) for Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson for an Amazon subpoena related to criminal case CRIM1048721.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking

events.title: Email forwarded with subpoena identifiers
events.description: The original January 16, 2020 email from the FBI agent is forwarded to another recipient, continuing the investigative correspondence regarding the Amazon subpoena.

keyFacts: The document is part of criminal case CRIM1048721 and involves a subpoena to Amazon for transaction data.
Ghislaine Maxwell and Ghislaine Borgerson are both subjects of the investigation, with specific identifiers (phone numbers, email addresses) and Amazon transaction details from 2019 being provided.
The investigation is being handled by the FBI's New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit.
The email is marked 'Privileged and Confidential', indicating its sensitive legal nature.
Specific Amazon transactions from August and November 2019 are listed, showing financial activity potentially relevant to the case.
